title: "Course overview"

![](/images/logo.png)

The course Large Language Model applications focuses on exploring and realizing the potential of LLMs (e.g., GPT-4 from OpenAI) to automate various business tasks. In particular, we will investigate how LLMs can be used to automate routine tasks such as composing emails and creating reports. 

:::{.callout-tip}
## Goal
The goal is to increase productivity and efficiency in companies while ensuring the quality and consistency of the content generated. 
:::

The project is offered in collaboration with [Zoi](https://www.zoi.tech/de), a company specializing in the development and consulting of AI-based technologies and applications in cloud environments.
